name: d3-horizon-chart
description: D3 Plugin that draws horizon charts using canvas.

scripts.pretest: mkdir -p build && node -e 'process.stdout.write("var version = \"" + require("./package.json").version + "\"; export * from \"../index\"; export {version};");' > build/bundle.js && rollup -f umd -g d3-array:d3_array,d3-axis:d3_axis,d3-selection:d3_selection,d3-scale:d3_scale -n d3_horizon_chart -o build/d3-horizon-chart.js -- build/bundle.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-horizon-chart.js -c -m -o build/d3-horizon-chart.min.js && rm -f build/d3-horizon-chart.zip && zip -j build/d3-horizon-chart.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-horizon-chart.js build/d3-horizon-chart.min.js
